Chordate:



Chordate received the comm. transmission from Windlord and sighed.  "Hold on. 
 We currently have a possible compromise with security.  I can't guarantee 
your safety, but you are just barely out of sensor range, so I can't confirm 
what you way, though I'm detecting Alliance members heading this way."

Chordate flipped a switch, the base going on red alert.  Klaxxons flashed 
everywhere, sirens going off throughout the base.  He activated the internal 
intercom.

"This is Chordate, red alert.  Prepare for possible Alliance attack.  There 
is currently a hostile outside the base.  Requesting three people to go and 
take him to the brig."
